line 1.speaker: Roger
line 1.text: Good afternoon. My name is Roger Ore, acting on behalf of the Baal Corporation. We'd like to offer you a job.

line 2.speaker: Roger
line 2.text: We have a crashed satellite north of Warbuk Station containing important data that the company wishes to recover.

line 3.speaker: Roger
line 3.text: While the company does have the option of sending an in-house team the crash site is in a remote location.

line 4.speaker: Roger
line 4.text: Your travel network would allow the task to be completed in significantly less time.

line 5.speaker: Roger
line 5.text: I can offer you [6,000] credits, payable upon completion of the job.

line 6.speaker: Roger
line 6.text: The information stored on the satellite is confidential and is the exclusive property of the Baal Corporation.

line 7.speaker: Roger
line 7.text: Any attempt to view or duplicate the information will result in a fine of up to [10,000] credits for breach of contract.
